subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: David Silva, Jordi Alba, Fernando Torres and Juan Mata scored in the 4-0 victory over Italy in the final. But it could have been any Spaniard, because, as the critics kept insisting, Spain lacks a central striker.
snippet: David Silva, Jordi Alba, Fernando Torres and Juan Mata scored in the 4-0 victory over Italy in the final. But it could have been any Spaniard, because, as the critics kept insisting, Spain lacks a central striker.
